Name: April Marie Walker
Description:
April was shot.

> April Marie Walker, a 45-year-old [trans woman] who lived in the 2000 block North 29th Street, was found shot this morning in the doorway of an apartment in the Creighton Court public housing.
>
> Walker was well known and popular with Creighton Court residents, said Alicia Rasin, founder of Citizens Against Crime. “April was a very community-oriented person and [she] was the best event coordinator in Creighton Court,” Rasin said. “On holidays, [she] would always decorate the front of [her] apartment to the delight of neighborhood children.
>
> “Whenever the kids did good in school, [she] had a gift for them to encourage them to continue to do good at school,” Rasin said.
>
> “Whenever there was a problem in Creighton Court, [she] was right there. [She] loved Creighton Court and the people there loved [her]m back. Nobody said anything bad about April. [She was good-hearted.”

https://chpn.net/2005/07/02/popular-transvestite-is-richmonds-52nd-homicide-of-the-year/

Name: Name Unknown
Description: The victim was one of two unidentified trans people shot to death.

Name: Darryl Fearon
Description:
Darryl was not trans himself, but was had come to the aid of three trans people who were being harassed by Christian Soto-Ruiz, 19, in the early morning of 16th July on W. 10th St.

Soto-Ruiz stabbed him to death with a kitchen knife, and slashed one of the trans people.

http://thevillager.com/villager_76/murdervictimsneighbors.html

http://students673.ucr.edu/docsserver/lgbt/trans_remembrance_display_posters.pdf

Name: Leandro Bispo Estavao
Description:
Leandro died after being stabbed in the neck.

>My name is Leandro Bispo Estavao (Lay-AWN-dro BEECE-poh ess-taw-VAH-oh), a
twenty-one year old transgender sex worker in Boltiere in Bergamo, Italy.
>
> I was killed in the early morning of July twentieth after my throat was
slashed with a knife.

https://forums.spacebattles.com/threads/just-read-and-dont-say-anything-please.74051/

Name: Ricky Lee Blakes
Description:
Ricky was reportedly a cross dresser. He was shot multiple times, allegedly by Anthony Rogers, who picked up Ricky, believing they were a [cisgender] woman, then violently killed them.

> NORWALK -- Double murder suspect Anthony Rogers may have shot 23-year-old Ricky Lee Blakes Jr. because the college student cross-dressed and offered him sex, a recently unsealed court affidavit indicates.
>
> An informant told police that "Rogers has a strong hatred for gay people," and Rogers' friend and confidant Joshua Huckabee told police that he'd claimed killing Blakes after the young man, dressed in a mini skirt, halter top and wig, tried to give him oral sex, according to the Feb. 6 affidavit, filed at Stamford Superior Court.
>
> Rogers, formerly of 18 Quintard Ave., was driving in South Norwalk when he stopped and picked up Blakes, Huckabee told police. Rogers banged Blakes' head against the steering wheel, threw him out of the car and shot him in the back after the student made sexual advances, according to Huckabee's written statement.

https://www.thehour.com/norwalk/article/Homophobia-possible-motive-in-alleged-murder-8289462.php

https://www.thehour.com/norwalk/article/Murder-trial-against-convicted-killer-of-Norwalk-8270398.php
